name: It is the 7th of July
description:
"It is the 7th of July"  is a short game about my experience with time.

Press the E key to continue in the dialogue.
Press Esc to leave the game.
Press Alt + Enter to exit fullscreen.

Credits:
Nattea - (https://twitter.com/ItsNatArt) - Writing, art, minor programming.
Meteor/Rob - Lead Programming (No Links)
Seth Gibbs - Sound (https://linktr.ee/sethgibbs)

Dialogue system from https://friendlycosmonaut.itch.io/dialoguesystem (Thanks!)
